se.cbb.jprime.apps.dlrs

Class Realisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.apps.dlrs.Realisation

  • public class Realisation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a dated guest tree according to the DLRS model. As such, it also induces a reconciliation with the host tree.

    A realisation is presented on PrIME-Newick format, with times as branch lengths, and additional vertex PrIME tags for leaf/speciation/loss status:
    (A:1.0[&&PrIME VertexType=Leaf], (B:0.2[&&PrIME VertexType=Leaf], C:0.2[&&PrIME VertexType=Leaf]):0.8[&&PrIME VertexType=Duplication]):1.0[&&PrIME VertexType=Speciation]; .

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

        public Realisation(RBTree G,

        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        G - tree topology.
        names - names of G.
        times - times of G.
        isDup - for each vertex v of G: true if v corresponds to a duplication; false if v corresponds to a speciation or leaf.
